title: Travel Alert For Turnpike Drivers
maintext: Drivers on Interstate 476, take note: Travel through the Lehigh Tunnel will be single-lane from today through Friday. The southbound tunnel will be closed and motorists in either direction will use a single lane of the nourthbound tunnel from 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. each day. The restrictions are necessary to allow crews to safely perform planned maintenance inside the southbound tunnel. Message boards will be activated to update motorists of any changes to the schedule caused by inclement weather or unforeseen traffic conditions. If the work is delayed, it will take place on the next available day. The tunnel is located between Lehigh Valley, Exit 56, and Mahoning Valley, Exit 74 on Interstate 476. â€” STAFF WRITER
